text: Porrittia imbecilla is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Egypt, Israel, Saudi Arabia and Yemen. The larvae feed on Conyza dioscoridis. ==References== Category:Pterophorini Category:Lepidoptera of Egypt Category:Lepidoptera of Israel Category:Moths described in 1925 Category:Moths of the Arabian Peninsula Category:Taxa named by Edward Meyrick
title: Porrittia imbecilla
